snippet: Andreas Scholl and Tamar Halperin performed Robert Johnson’s composition of a Ben Jonson poem as part of the Art of the Song series at Alice Tully Hall.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by countertenor Andreas Scholl and pianist Tamar Halperin at Alice Tully Hall as part of the Art of the Song series.
lead_paragraph: Andreas Scholl and Tamar Halperin performed Robert Johnson’s composition of a Ben Jonson poem as part of the Art of the Song series at Alice Tully Hall.

headline.seo: Andreas Scholl and Tamar Halperin at Lincoln Center
headline.main: Trying to Give Voice to Unparalleled Purity
headline.print_headline: Trying to Give Voice to Unparalleled Purity
